main.name: Amrutha Adiyath
main.description: I'm a passionate coder who loves what I do! With {{EXPERIENCE}} years of experience under my belt, I take pride in writing quality code. I’ve got skills in front-end, back-end, and database development.
main.bio: Hey there! I’m Amrutha Adiyath, and I’m currently enjoying life in Moose Jaw, Saskatchewan. I've spent {{EXPERIENCE}} years diving into programming, working with front-end and back-end technologies like ReactJS, Java, Python, and PostgreSQL.
main.bio_p: When I'm not coding, I'm unleashing my creativity as a hobby artist. Front-end dev is my playground! I'm also a big animal lover, rescuing and fostering cats (even the grumpy ones!). In my downtime, you’ll catch me gaming, experimenting with new recipes, binge-watching movies, or jamming to some classic rock.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skills and what I’m really good at:

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Technology Management
education.description: This program really sharpened my skills in Java, Python, and SQL Server for project development. I learned about network management, PowerBI, and Agile project management, along with business strategies like ITIL and data privacy.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
education.description: This is where I dove into data structures, algorithms, and built websites. My love for web development kicked off here, mixing theory with practice by creating personal projects and course-related work.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: I teamed up with the owner and main developer, helping out with the development and maintenance of his PHP-based applications.

work.title: Store Associate
work.description: I assisted customers in finding what they need and ensure their orders are processed smoothly. Building great relationships with customers is something I excel in, making sure they leave happy.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: I kicked off my journey in front-end development with ReactJS and then switched gears to back-end work with Java, Python, and NodeJS. My projects included crafting front-end solutions, backend order systems, and database designs.

work.title: Developer Intern
work.description: I got to learn the ropes in front-end tech, working on converting wireframes into actual web pages.

volunteer.description: I’m helping out with SCRAPS, rescuing and fostering cats that need a bit of extra love. It’s all about giving them a cozy home, socializing them, and finding their forever families. Plus, I get to cuddle cats all day—what’s not to love?

I volunteered with PAWS Thrissur to rescue and foster stray cats, giving them care, attention, and a safe space until they found their new homes. I also helped spread the word about animal welfare around town. It was as rewarding as it was full of furry fun!

certifications.name: IELTS
certifications.description: Certified my English skills with an overall band score of 8, and 8.5 in speaking.

projects.title: theOathWriter.com
projects.category: Portfolio website for a friend (offline now)
